document.heading: Jobs for D.C. Residents Amendment Act of 2007

history.narrative: Law 17-108, the “Jobs for D.C. Residents Amendment Act of 2007”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 17-185 which was referred to the Committee on Workforce Development and Government Operations. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on July 10, 2007, and October 2, 2007, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on October 26, 2007, it was assigned Act No. 17-172 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 17-108 became effective on February 6, 2008.
